server.model.database

Class SQLCreator

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.model.database.SQLCreator

  • public class SQLCreator
extends java.lang.Object
    Class, which accepts parts of a sql statement and returns a prepared statement.
    Version:
    "1.0.0a, 08/21/2013"
    Author:
    Torsten Dietl
